sections.general: sr. home mortgage consultant - wells fargo advisors
sections.summary: an accomplished, results-driven team player with over 20 years of experience in financial services. extensive broad expertise in banking, finance, investments, insurance, and relationship management. demonstrated proficiency in new business development across all business lines.
sections.skills: solid communication, interpersonal, time management, organizational, and leadership skills.
